lead_paragraph: Jozy Altidore, the Red Bulls’ 18-year-old scoring sensation, was selected yesterday to be on the United States roster for the Americans’ Nov. 17 exhibition game at South Africa and could make his international debut. Altidore was eighth in Major League Soccer with nine goals this season.
